#summary How to compile and set up SNEEK.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Requirements =

 * devkitPro
 * devkitARM (included in devkitPro, but most people didn't install it)
 * a SVN-Client ([http://www.sliksvn.com silksvn], [http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org tortoisseSVN], or other)
 * _Python (not necessarily, but will speed things up)_ 

= Introduction =

Seting up the requirements above is not handled here. *The rest of the guide comes as the day progresses.*
